(28-oz) tomatoes; juice reserved, tomatoes seeded then crushed

directions.step:
Heat 3 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan. Add onion, carrot, and celery- saut6 gently until softened, but not browned, about 10 minutes. Stir in tomato paste, then tomatoes and juice and wine. Simmer, partially covered, and stir frequently, until thickened to sauce consistency, about 45 minutes. Puree by passing through a food mill. Return to simmer-, season to taste with salt and pepper, before serving, stir in remaining butter.
Makes 2 1/2 cup.
Cook's Illustrated, Mar./Apr. 1994, Page 26. Credit: Julia Della Croce.
